snippet: The fire broke out just before 5 p.m. on the third floor of a six-story building near the south side of Van Cortlandt Park, according to the Fire Department.
abstract: Fire in Bronx apartment building leaves 11 people injured, two of them critically, with dozens of families displaced; cause of fire is under investigation.
lead_paragraph: The fire broke out just before 5 p.m. on the third floor of a six-story building near the south side of Van Cortlandt Park, according to the Fire Department.

headline.main: 11 Are Injured, Two Critically, in Bronx Fire
headline.print_headline: 11 Are Injured, Two Critically, in Bronx Fire
